title: Stuck at 13107517 with header not found
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2021.10.1-alpha`

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash : tag v2021.10.01

#### Backtrace

```
erigon[1787100]: [INFO] [10-04|00:44:50.814] [4/18 Bodies] Processing bodies...       from=13107517 to=13349505
erigon[1787100]: [EROR] [10-04|00:44:50.814] Staged Sync                              error="[4/18 Bodies] request more bodies: header not found: %!w(<nil>), blockNum=13107518, trace=[github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/turbo/stages/bodydownload.(*BodyDownload).RequestMoreBodies github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync.BodiesForward github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync.DefaultStages.func10 github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync.(*Sync).runStage github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync.(*Sync).Run github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/turbo/stages.StageLoopStep github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/turbo/stages.StageLoop]"
```

Tried to restart multiple times, still stuck with block 13107517.

When I request the block details through JSON RPC it returns a correct hash. And returns `null` for blocks 13107518+

Hi, please post output from:
```
pkill -SIGUSR1 erigon
```
